## skycli schema add

Add a column to the schema of a record type

### Synopsis


Add a column to the schema of a record type

```
skycli schema add <record_type> <column_name> <column_def>
```

```
      --access_token="": Access token
      --api_key="": API Key
      --config="": Config file location. Default is $HOME/.skycli/config.toml
```
